result.execSummary:
The defendant Ricardo R Lopez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court ordered all costs and surcharges be paid on or before 3-1-2016 or civil judgment. Court ordered DNA surcharges applies due to offense date.
Consecutive to: to any sentence. Huber for work, school and treatment. Court recommends against electronic monitoring.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ricardo R Lopez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.
.
Court sentenced defendant to serve 75 DAYS in the House of Correction CONSECUTIVE to any sentence with credit for 42 days served; Huber privileges for work, school and treatment. Court recommends against electronic monitoring.
.
Court ordered all costs and surcharges be paid on or before 3/1/2016 or civil judgment.
Court ordered DNA surcharges applies due to offense date.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief, received and filed.

Defendant Ricardo R Lopez in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Defendant Ricardo R Lopez in custody.  Jeffrey James Altenburg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy clerk:  dn
.
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Complaint. Judgment of conviction entered.

Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court, defendant Ricardo R Lopez not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Status conference held off the record.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Gabriela A Leija in court, defendant Ricardo R Lopez not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defendant's appearance waived for today's proceedings. Case calendared for scheduling conference. 
Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for July 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing.

Defendant Ricardo R Lopez in court with attorney Brian Christopher Hagner.  Defendant Ricardo R Lopez in custody.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($500.00 signature bond) ad
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Eric M. Vega in court prior to case being called.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for pre-trial conference.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.
Pre-trial conference on April 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Eric M. Vega in court via-telephone, defendant Ricardo R Lopez not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for pre-trial conference. Defense counsel Eric Vega is ill for today's proceedings. Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with all Kohls stores and all of Southridge Mall.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Ricardo R Lopez in court with attorney Eric M. Vega.  Defendant Ricardo R Lopez in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Ricardo R Lopez
Current: 1238 South 15th Place, Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53204   (Effective: 03-26-2015)
Prior: 1238 South 15th Place, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
